name: Unbelt Management
description:
Your Ship just collided with a meteor , and your seat-belt just broke ! You are pretty much doomed, floating aimlessly , but at least you can try to keep your spaceship running for long as possible. you have some things to take care of, I left you a memo :[Changes made in the After-Jam Edition]
  • Revamped difficulties ( change camera speed )
  • Lot of balancing ( 60secs nightmare mode now should be possible )
  • Changed some sfx ( and sound balancing )
  • Added "Give Up" button to quit current level
  • Now in Fullscreen !
